title: Client Package for Vipunen API
text: vipunen client package Vipunen, education administration’s reporting portal. Ministry Education Culture Finnish National Agency Education jointly responsible content Vipunen, nothing R package. Statistical data Vipunen also machine readable REST/JSON API. API opened August 2017 currently still development phase. first phase, content moslty related data collected universities. data available API licensed Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC 4.0). cite data, please use following format: (Finnish) Vipunen - opetushallinnon tilastopalvelu: Raportin nimi. Tietolähde. Saantitapa: Vipunen-rajapinta [Viitattu pvm] (English) Vipunen - Educational Statistics Finland: Report name. Source. Acquired : Vipunen API [Date cited] TBA: citation example details API (Finnish ), please see: https://vipunen.fi/fi-fi/Sivut/Vipunen-API
